title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.6 - Operation of vehicles on landing areas restricted
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.6 - Operation of vehicles on landing areas restricted

State Regulations

All vehicles operating on active public landing areas
shall have prior permission and be equipped with a functioning two-way radio
tuned to ground control frequency. In addition, between the hours of sunset and
sunrise such vehicles shall have an overhead amber light. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1262.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
